alert.note: Alert for Aguada; Anasco; Lares; Las Marias; Maricao; Moca; Rincon; San Sebastian (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 20 at 5:50PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Aguada, Anasco, Lares, Las Marias, Maricao, Moca, Rincon and San Sebastian. * WHEN...Until 600 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Excessive runoff along rivers and streams. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 450 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated most of the heavy rain continue to diminish but excessive runoff from recent heavy rains will conitinue to affect rivers and streams. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Estimated amounts between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... San Sebastian, Anasco, Las Marias, Lares, Moca, Aguada, Rincon, Hato Arriba, Luyando, Aceitunas, La Playa, Maricao, Juncal, Espino and Stella. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Aguada; Anasco; Lares; Las Marias; Maricao; Moca; Rincon; San Sebastian
